fixes.name: Selected Metric Value
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR SelectedMetric = SELECTEDVALUE('Select Metric'[Display As])
RETURN
SWITCH(
    SelectedMetric,
    "Likes", SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day]),
    "Posts", SUM('test+'[Posts_Per_Day]),
    "Messages", SUM('test+'[Messages_Sent_Per_Day]),
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Select Metric'[Display As]) and used SWITCH to map parameter values to the corresponding SUM aggregations. All column references were converted to the 'test+'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter and uses aggregation functions (SUM), so it must be implemented as a measure.
